summary: Defines a response object for the mocked Kinesis Video Archived Media service that encapsulates the video fragment returned by a request together with the generated DASH and HLS streaming session URLs, and provides helper methods to access this data and interact with the underlying mock backend.
business_intent: To emulate the behavior of AWS Kinesis Video Archived Media responses in a testing environment, allowing developers to retrieve video segments and obtain streaming session URLs without invoking the real service.
